title: Audit Real Estate Lease Administration
description: An auditor reviews the administration of the company's real estate leases.

tasks.description: Obtain a list of all real estate leases and abstract key data points like rent amount, escalation clauses, and expiration dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: A master summary of all lease data is created.

tasks.description: Select a sample of lease payments and verify they agree with the terms in the lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds one instance where a rent escalation clause was missed, resulting in an underpayment.

tasks.description: Recommend the implementation of a lease administration software to better track critical dates and payment amounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recommendation is made to improve the lease management process.
